column4: Hi, all. My ubuntu installation is hanging at "Starting up the partitioner" (scanning disks...). I previously installed Yellow Dog Linux, and that might have something to do with it. I formatted my 2GB swap partition using the GNOME Partition Editor, then within the ubuntu installer I selected the partition I used for YDL, and checked the option to format it. I am currently running on the install CD. Thanks in advance for your help.
do you know if the ydl for ps3 is out yet or better yet are you a subscribed member to get it ? ;)
I don't own a PS3, however I do know it's possible to install linux on a PS#
